p: Postmortem examination of four Mealy Parrots that were euthanized showed necrotising splenitis in three birds (bird 1, 3, and 4), and necrotising hepatitis in two birds (bird 1 and 4) ( Fig. 1A and 1B, Table 2). C. psittaci PCR was positive for all four birds, and Giemsa and Gimenez stains for C. psittaci were positive in the liver tissue of bird 1 ( Fig. 1C).
